拐.definition: to turn (a corner etc); to kidnap; to swindle; to misappropriate; seven (used as a substitute for 七[qi1]); variant of 枴|拐[guai3]

拐彎.definition: to go round a curve; to turn a corner; fig. a new direction

拐彎兒.definition: erhua variant of 拐彎|拐弯[guai3 wan1]

拐彎抹角.definition: lit. going round the curves and skirting the corners (idiom); fig. to speak in a roundabout way; to equivocate; to beat about the bush

拐賣.definition: human trafficking; to abduct and sell; to kidnap and sell

拐點.definition: turning point; breaking point; inflexion point (math., a point of a curve at which the curvature changes sign)
